author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #49740 to 16_0_X. A backport is needed so we can start testing the network monitoring sooner. See the original PR for the complete description and discussion.  The first part of the description from the original PR follows below:

Implement network packet labels. See issue #47517 for further discussion and the initial request for this feature. This PR will cause a CGI parameter to be appended to PFNs (Physical File Names) of the form

```"?scitag.flow=<scitag_id>"```

...

FYI @stlammel

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1803

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass in 16_0_X. New ones were added in the original PR to test the new feature added by this PR.
title: [16_0_X] Implement network packet labels
